attributes.action: make Bruce Forsyth a knight of the realm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bruce deserves to be knighted because he is a credit to the nation

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Knightbrucie/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
